original_text: Pharaoh said to Joseph, “I had a dream, and no one can interpret it. But I have heard it said of you that when you hear a dream you can interpret it.”
korean_text: 바로가 요셉에게 이르되 내가 한 꿈을 꾸었으나 그것을 해석하는 자가 없더니 들은즉 너는 꿈을 들으면 능히 푼다 하더라

sentences.original_text: and no one can interpret it
But I have heard it said of you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신에 대해 말하는 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: that when you hear a dream
